article_title: Doug Badger: Taxpayers squeezed for Obamacare losses
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description: Many insurance companies are losing money selling Obamacare policies. Unfortunately, the White House wants to make their losses your problem.In December, the Republican-led Congress refused an administration request to provide insurers with $2.5 billion in bailout money to help cover their 2014 losses.The Obama administration hasn't given up. It has declared that this $2.5 billion in corporate welfare — and potentially billions more for losses insurers have incurred in 2015 — is
article_metadata.author: Doug Badger
